name: year
text: Only the years 2011 and 2012 are available (until we get a bigger hard-drive)

name: cf_exponent
full_name: Capacity factor exponent for spatial distribution of wind and solar
text: If exponent is 0 generators are distributed evenly across the region, if it is 1 they are distributed proportional to capacity factor, if it is x they are distributed proportional to (capacity factor)^x

name: frequency
text: n-hourly, n<3 is very slow, big n solves faster (n=25 or n=49 give fast and relatively accurate results)

name: efuel
text: NB: Currently the technology selection is limited to pipeline hydrogen

name: efuels_load
text: Demand should be large enough for utility-scale assets but small enough to neglect land availability constraints

name: pipeline_distance_factor
text: Factor that multiplies direct distance between source and destination to account for indirect pipeline routes; represents rough average of distance considered in Hampp et al (2023)

name: shipping_distance_factor
text: Factor that multiplies direct distance between source and destination to account for indirect shipping routes; represents rough average of distance considered in Hampp et al (2023)

name: overland_fraction
full_name: Fraction of transport route that goes over land
text: This is applied if there are separate overland and submarine pipeline or electricity transmission costs

name: hydrogen_submarine_pipeline_cost
text: Assume similar cost as for CH4 (g) submarine pipeline but with the same factor as between onland CH4 (g) pipeline and H2 (g) pipeline (2.86). This estimate is comparable to a 36in diameter pipeline calaculated based on d’Amore-Domenech et al (2021): 10.1016/j.apenergy.2021.116625 , supplementary material (=251 EUR/MW/km).
